heading_one: Let’s get started with your %state_name% voting registration
subheading_one: Choose whether to report a change to your registration or to begin a new registration. Complete your voter registration by answering a few questions. It should take you between 5 to 10 minutes.
heading_two: Select one of the options below to continue.
update_btn_header: I am already registered in %state_name% and need to report a change in my information.
update_btn_paragraph: Click here to report a change to the information associated with your registration, such as name,  address, or political party.
new_btn_header: I am registering in %state_name% for the first time.
new_btn_paragraph: Click here to register for the first time in this state. We recommend you have a driver’s license or non-driver identification number available for registration.
